Headline: #43 43rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 43rd/Vincennes
ShortDescription: Westbound 43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 43rd, Saint Lawrence, 42nd, King Drive, and 43rd due to, street blockage near 43rd/Vincennes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 43rd, Saint Lawrence, 42nd, King Drive, and 43rd due to, street blockage near 43rd/Vincennes.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green and Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green and Pink Line trains are running w/ residual delays after an earlier bridge lift at the Chicago River, downtown. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Green and Pink Line trains are running with residual delays after an earlier bridge lift at the Chicago River, downtown.

 Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.
